​ DAS​ 0x04d9​ ​ ​ DAS_KEYBOARD​ 0x2013​ ​
F7 - F12 to Music Controls (daskeyboard only) F7 to Music Prev F8 to Music Play/Pause F9 to Music Next F10 to Volume Mute F11 to Volume Down F12 to Volume Up private.musiccontrols DeviceVendor::DAS, DeviceProduct::DAS_KEYBOARD​ __KeyToConsumer__ KeyCode::F7, ConsumerKeyCode::MUSIC_PREV __KeyToConsumer__ KeyCode::F8, ConsumerKeyCode::MUSIC_PLAY __KeyToConsumer__ KeyCode::F9, ConsumerKeyCode::MUSIC_NEXT __KeyToConsumer__ KeyCode::F10, ConsumerKeyCode::VOLUME_MUTE __KeyToConsumer__ KeyCode::F11, ConsumerKeyCode::VOLUME_DOWN __KeyToConsumer__ KeyCode::F12, ConsumerKeyCode::VOLUME_UP
